name: breakup-survival
description: This site is a repository of things to do, watch, read, listen to, and think during times of heartache. It was inspired by the podcast Death Sex and Money's [Breakup](http://www.wnyc.org/story/cut-loose-breakups-death-sex-money/) episode and originally populated with suggestions from the show's listener-created Google Sheet [Breakup Survival Kit.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1M42gLZLANOxXxl9-N2MEYcw0FW9ng2fSRhaLtrMykw0/edit)
